mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.dic_name AS item_type_dic, c.uom_name as primary_uom_dic, d.warehouse_name AS inbound_warehouse, e.warehouse_name AS receive_warehouse, f.dic_name as code_type_dic FROM wms_item a LEFT JOIN wms_dic_list b ON a.item_type = b.dic_id LEFT JOIN wms_uom c ON a.primary_uom = c.uom_id LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse d ON a.inv_warehouse_code = d.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse e ON a.rcv_warehouse_code = e.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN wms_dic_list f ON a.code_type = f.dic_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
